Package edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.core

Class Summary
Action Action provides a general wrapper for the intent to be fired.
ActionExecuter The ActionExecuter is the engine which will execute all actions.
CallPhoneAction CallPhoneAction can return an Intent that can be fired to perform a phone call.
Event This class encapsulates a generic event.
Filter This class contains a user defined filter, which will be checked against an event's attribute data to see if the event matches the user defined Rule.
HandlerService This class is the heart of OmniDroid.
IntentParser This class parses the received android.content.Intent's action field to see if it is an OmniDroid supported event.
LocationChangedEvent This class encapsulates an LocationChanged event.
PhoneIsFallingEvent This class encapsulates a PhoneIsFalling event.
PhoneRingingEvent This class encapsulates an PhoneRinging event.
RegisteredApp RegisteredApps are applications that OmniDroid can interact with.
Rule This class represents a user defined rule.
RuleProcessor Gets the Rule(s) triggered by this Event and compares the event attributes with the Filter(s) defined for each rule.
SendGmailAction This action wrap an intent to send to GMail service.
SendSmsAction SendSmsAction class creates SMS intent that is used to send SMS
SMSReceivedEvent This class encapsulates an SMS event.
